backend/main.mo: Implements core backend types and logic for user profiles, role checks, ambulance/police location tracking, SOS alerts, and distance calculations with access‑controlled queries and updates.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence for police/ambulance visibility, stale update handling, and correct contact association.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides high‑level summaries for all frontend files including hooks, pages, components, utilities, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and OKLCH‑based color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Leaflet from CDN and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Controls authentication flow, profile setup, ambulance-only phone validation, and routing to ambulance or police interfaces.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays branding, share link controls, user info with role badge, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/LinkDomainInfoPa: Dialog explaining the shareable app URL and requirements for configuring custom domains.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: UI card prompting users to authenticate via Internet Identity with role icons and a login button.
frontend/src/components/PhoneNumberCaptu: Form allowing an authenticated user to enter and save a validated phone number to their profile, with error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Initial profile setup form for entering name, phone number, and selecting a role before saving to backend.
frontend/src/components/RealtimeMap.tsx: Leaflet-based realtime map that initializes a tile map, smooths marker movement, and updates markers in place.
frontend/src/components/ShareAppLinkCont: Button to copy the app's share URL with clipboard API fallback support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, persisted identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, SOS, and ambulance/police location updates with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark themes, color variables, and gradient backgrounds.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AmbulanceInterface.ts: Ambulance UI handling GPS tracking, SOS triggers, location smoothing, and map display.
frontend/src/pages/PoliceInterface.tsx: Police UI showing ambulance locations, SOS alerts, filtering options, and live GPS updates.
frontend/src/types/leaflet-global.d.ts: Type declaration for the global Leaflet instance on window.
frontend/src/utils/getShareUrl.ts: Utility returning the full current browser URL for sharing.
frontend/src/utils/leafletMarkers.ts: Utilities for building Leaflet marker icons and detecting marker changes.
frontend/src/utils/locationRefresh.ts: Shared constants for update timing and radius plus distance formatting helpers.
frontend/src/utils/locationSmoothing.ts: GPS smoothing, filtering, and distance utilities to reduce jitter and outliers.
frontend/src/utils/mapsDirections.ts: Builds Google Maps directions URLs using destination and optional origin coordinates.
frontend/src/utils/phoneValidation.ts: Provides phone validation, digit normalization, and user-friendly validation messages for 10‑digit numbers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters, including hash-based routing and sessionStorage utilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state and feature fixes focused on improving police-side ambulance visibility and correctness.
